home.title: MCP Router
home.description: A tool for managing MCP servers and providing APIs

verifyYourServer.title: Verify Your Server
verifyYourServer.description: Verify your server to enhance trust

settings.title: Settings
settings.loginOptionalDescription: Login is optional. You can use MCP Router without an account, though some features may be limited.
settings.freeCreditsDescription: Earn 50 credits for each successful invitation. Get 1 credit each time your shared agents are used.
settings.communityDescription: Join our Discord community to get support, share feedback, and connect with other users.

agents.title: Agents
agents.useDescription: Start a conversation with your agents
agents.packageManagerOverlayDescription: Agents require package managers to run MCP servers. The following package managers need to be installed:
agents.installationCompleteMessage: Package managers have been installed successfully.
agents.restartInstructions: Please restart the application to apply environment variable changes.
agents.restartDescription: Restart the application to apply changes
agents.troubleshootingDescription: If the package manager installation continues to fail after multiple attempts, please check our documentation for alternative installation methods and troubleshooting steps.
agents.createDescription: Enter information for the new agent
agents.purposePlaceholder: Enter the purpose of this agent
agents.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a brief description of this agent
agents.setupInstructionsPlaceholder: Enter setup instructions for the agent
agents.shareConfirmDescription: Review the agent settings and provide a description before sharing
agents.deployConfirmDescription: Review the agent settings and configure deployment options
agents.publicDeployDescription: When enabled, your agent will be publicly accessible via a share link. You'll earn 1 credit each time someone uses your shared agent.

loginRequired.featureDescription: You need to be logged in to use this feature. Please go to Settings to log in, or continue with limited functionality.

agents.importDescription: Import an agent using a share code
agents.mcpServerEnabledDescription: Allow this agent to be used as an MCP server by other applications
agents.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?
agents.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. The agent will be deleted.
agents.instructionsDesc: Enter instructions to guide the agent's behavior

placeholders.name: e.g. Translation Agent
placeholders.purpose: Enter the purpose of this agent
placeholders.description: Enter a brief description of this agent
placeholders.instructions: Enter detailed instructions for the agent

mcpSettings.title: MCP Servers
mcpSettings.createServerDescription: Add an MCP server that the agent can use
mcpSettings.commandDescription: If pnpm or uv is not installed in the user's environment, it will be installed automatically.
mcpSettings.argsDescription: Enter package name and options. Use `{}` for dynamic arguments.
mcpSettings.environmentVariablesDescription: Add environment variable key names. Values will be set by users.
mcpSettings.setupInstructionsPlaceholder: Enter setup guide for variables so non-technical users can configure the MCP server properly.
mcpSettings.toolPermissionsDescription: Configure which MCP server tools the agent can use
mcpSettings.updateCheckFailed: Failed to check for package updates
mcpSettings.updateInfoFetchFailed: Failed to fetch update information for {{name}}

errors.agentNotFound: The specified agent was not found
errors.chatError: An error occurred while communicating with the API
errors.descriptionRequired: Please enter a description for the agent
errors.instructionsRequired: Please enter instructions for the agent
errors.generateFailed: Error generating agent instructions. Max length is 1000 characters.

success.deployedAndImported: Agent "{{name}}" was deployed and imported to your local agents

mcpApps.title: MCP App Integrations
mcpApps.description: Manage MCP configuration for supported AI applications.
mcpApps.customAppDescription: Create a custom app integration with MCP Router.
mcpApps.configured: MCP Router is configured for this application.
mcpApps.notConfigured: MCP Router configuration is not set up for this application.
mcpApps.installRequired: Install this application to use MCP Router with it.
mcpApps.selectServers: Select which servers this app can access:
mcpApps.selectScopes: Configure access permissions for this app:
mcpApps.noTokenAvailable: No token available for this app. Token scopes can only be configured for apps with active tokens.
mcpApps.enterValidName: Please enter a valid app name
mcpApps.deleteWarning: Are you sure you want to delete this custom app? This action cannot be undone.

serverDetails.advancedConfigurationDescription: Configure advanced server settings including command, arguments, and environment variables
serverDetails.editParametersDescription: Edit input parameters for this server
serverDetails.bearerTokenHelp: Authentication token used for secure access to the remote server.
serverDetails.editConfigurationDescription: Edit your server configuration. Changes may require server restart.
serverDetails.name: Name
serverDetails.commandHelp: Enter the command to start your server.
serverDetails.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}}?
serverDetails.serverNeedsToBeStarted: Server needs to be started to generate request logs
serverDetails.removeWarning: Removing this server will delete its configuration and files. This action cannot be undone.
serverDetails.startWithLogsDescription: Start server and show real-time logs
serverDetails.serverMustBeRunning: Server must be running for this operation
serverDetails.serverInfoOpened: Server info opened in new tab
serverDetails.viewAPISpecDescription: View API specification for this server
serverDetails.exportConfigDescription: Export server configuration as JSON file
serverDetails.commandNotFound: Command is not installed. Server startup may fail.

importFromJson.title: Import from JSON
importFromJson.description: Import MCP servers from a JSON configuration file
importFromJson.errorInvalidJson: The provided input is not valid JSON.
importFromJson.errorNoMcpServers: The configuration must contain an 'mcpServers' object.
importFromJson.errorEmptyMcpServers: The 'mcpServers' object must contain at least one server.
importFromJson.errorMissingCommand: Server '{{serverName}}' is missing the required 'command' field.
importFromJson.errorInvalidArgs: Server '{{serverName}}' has invalid 'args'. It must be an array.
importFromJson.errorFailedImport: Failed to import servers from JSON.

invitation.description: Generate and manage invitation codes for others to join
invitation.pleaseLogin: Login required to create invitation codes

tokenScopes.serverManagementDesc: Allows managing MCP servers including connection, creation, modification, and deletion
tokenScopes.logManagementDesc: Provides access to view and manage logs from MCP servers

rules.title: Tool Parameter Rules
rules.parameterDescription: You can define additional parameters that will be added to all tools' input schemas. These parameters will be available for the model to input when using the tools.
rules.noParametersAdded: No additional parameters have been defined yet.

errors.requiredMustExist: Required field must exist in properties
